::Zardus::

Zardus reaches the end of the hallway, turning quickly so that nothing behind the hallway could catch him unaware. There wasn't anything there. He proceeds forward, constantly scanning, though it wasn't doing much good. They were walking through a fairly small hallway, completely dark except for the lights off of Zardus's gun. The sound of water dripping echoed down the hallway.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack/Hurricane:::
> 
> ::They followed Zardus close, both with their guns ready in case anything 
> happened::
